1.2.0.en: Bug fixes. Support for pairing Watty.

1.2.2.en: Bug fix for missing flowcard id

1.2.3.en: Fixed fetching current temperature for home location

1.2.4.en: Added a note about re-adding a Pulse/Watty device in case fetching data timeouts

1.2.5.en: Support for retrieving production power from Pulse

1.2.6.en: Update measure_power even when it's 0 or same as previous

1.2.7.en: Allow production power being reported less frequently than power

1.3.4.en: Avoid error in price triggers when last price is not populated

1.3.5.en: Fix Tibber icon color dropped by homey cli

1.3.11.en: Increase data fetch timeout. Fix data fetch retry logic.

1.4.0.en: Rewrite of Tibber API data access to reduce load at hour shift. Use a cache for day-ahead-prices for today and tomorrow. Home non-real time consumption report is now enabled with an advanced parameter (default to false). Support for displaying real time current per phase for Pulse and Watty.

1.4.1.en: Bug fix for calculating amount of hours to be fetched for consumption report

1.4.2.en: Bug fix for keeping track of last logged daily consumption

1.4.3.en: New triggers for currents reported by Pulse and Watty

1.4.7.en: Fix crash related to Pulse/Watty trigger registration

1.4.9.en: Deactivate device if home can't be found anymore. Add price level indicator. Fix current triggers for L2 and L3.

1.4.10.en: Change price level to an enumeration

1.4.12.en: Update readme to include price level trigger

1.4.13.en: Bug fix for price fetch scheduling

1.5.0.en: Support for Homey Bridge. Add trigger and condition for top/bottom X hours today. Outdoor temperature for Home removed. Fix parsing high prices.

1.5.1.en: Fix for showing both old and new price capabilities at the same time

1.5.2.en: Using updated price information from the Tibber API

1.5.5.en: Support Homey Bridge. Add trigger and condition for top/bottom X hours today. Outdoor temperature for Home removed. Using updated price information from the Tibber API. Fix parsing high prices.

1.5.10.en: Reverted to using 5 price levels. Fixed price sometimes failing to update. Show price device indicator with 2 decimals. Safer handling of current updates/triggers

1.5.13.en: Fixed device pairing not always working. Fixed highest/lowest price cards not always working as intended. Improved reliability of triggers/updates. Improved reliability of fetching prices.

1.5.14.en: Fixed timezone issue fetching fallback Nord Pool price on Homey Bridge

1.6.0.en: Support for web socket sub protocol graphql-transport-ws

1.6.2.en: Automatically disable pulse/watty when paired home not present anymore

1.7.1.en: Added global tokens for lowest and highest price today. Fixed timezone issue with price on Homey Bridge. Updated dependencies

1.8.2.en: Improved real time device handling during startup and when device is removed from the account

1.8.3.en: Properly clean up websockets on Homey Bridge

1.8.4.en: Added fallback price currency EUR and areas BE, DE-LU, FI and NL. Prices no longer have internally truncated decimals when updated, but are still shown with two decimals. Updated dependencies

1.8.6.en: Updated dependencies. Updated required Homey version

1.9.0.en: Updated dependencies. Added caching of yesterdays prices, a new condition card, source link to manifest and new icons. Small API refactoring

1.9.18.en: Reintroduce changes from 1.9.0. Reduce resource utilization. Improve trigger reliability

1.9.20.en: Imported/exported power accumulated capabilities. Updated dependencies.

1.10.0.en: Added app Web API to enable other apps to access device data; see README in source code on GitHub for details

1.10.1.en: Handle errors in app Web API

1.10.2.en: Handle real-time event crash on Homey Cloud
